abstract: The fines, related to Toyota’s delays in announcing vehicle recalls in the United States, are the maximum allowed by law.
snippet: The fines, related to Toyota’s delays in announcing vehicle recalls in the United States, are the maximum allowed by law.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Toyota on Monday agreed to pay two more fines, totaling $32.4 million, for failing to swiftly recall millions of defective vehicles, the Transportation Department said.

headline.main: Toyota to Pay $32.4 Million in Fines Related to Two Recalls
headline.print_headline: Toyota to Pay $32.4 Million In Fines Related to Two Recalls
